document_data.mainbody: '''Evil domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with evil [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[protection from good]]'', ''[[desecrate]]'', and ''[[magic circle against good]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[unholy blight]]'', ''[[dispel good]]'', and ''[[create undead]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[blasphemy]]'', ''[[unholy aura]]'', and ''[[summon monster IX]]''.
